comments.html: DMVPN is a great solution to interconnect 2 sites easily. (and for optimize the flows)
comments.name: Lionel Gavage

comments.html:
If you need to connect two sites, DMVPN is the very last technology I would consider. Anything else would be simpler. More about VPN technologies in my webinar:

http://choosevpn.eventbrite.com/
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
